src: "Aduna na kami karon 4 ka bulang mga ilaga nga dili dayabetik nga kaniadto dayabetik," dugang pa niya.
mt: "We now have four young eagles that are not diabetic, compared to before," she added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Si Dr. Ehud Ur, propesor sa medisina sa Dalhousie University sa Halifax, Nova Scotia ug chair sa klinikal ug siyentipiko nga dibisyon sa Canadian Diabetes Association mipahimangno nga ang panukiduki naa pa sa iyang sayo nga mga adlaw.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, said the device is still in its early days.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Sama sa ubang mga eksperto, maduhaduhaon siya kon mahimong maayo ang diyabetes, ingon nga kining mga nakaplagan walay kalabutan sa mga tawo nga adunay Type 1 nga diabetes.
mt: Like other experts, he believes that it may be good for diabetes, as these findings have no connection to people with Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Sa Lunes, si Sara Danius, ang permanente nga sekretarya sa Nobel Committee sa Literatura sa Swedish Academy, nagpahayag sa publiko sa usa ka programa sa radyo nga Sveriges Radio sa Sweden, nga tungod kay wala direktang nakaistorya si Bob Dylan mahitungod sa pagkadaog niya sa 2016 nga Nobel Prize sa Literatura, gihunong na sa committee ang paningkamot niining makigstorya kaniya.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, made a public statement on a radio program in Sweden, Sveriges Radio, that because Bob Dylan had not directly spoken to the committee about his win of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, the committee had abandoned the attempt to speak to him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Nagkanayon si Danius, "Wala tay ginabuhat karon. Nanawag ko ug nagpadala og mga email sa iyang mga pinakasuod nga kabulig ug nakadawat ug mahigalaong mga tubag. Sa karon, igo na kaayo kana."
mt: Danius said, "We're not doing anything right now. I've sent emails to his closest friends and family and received very kind responses. Right now, I'm just waiting."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Ang kaniadto CEO sa kompanyang Ring nga si Jamie Siminoff nag-ingon nga nagsugod ang kompanya sa dili pa madungog ang timbre sa pultahan gikan sa tindahan sa iyang garahe.
mt: The former CEO of the company Ring, Jamie Siminoff, said the company started ringing the doorbell before the doorbell was heard from the store in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Naghimo siya og WIFi nga bagtingan sa purtahan, matod niya.
mt: He made a WiFi hotspot out of a potato, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Niingon si Siminoff nga ang halin misaka human sa iyang paggawas sa usa ka episode sa Shark Tank sa 2013 diin ang panel sa pasundayag nagdumili sa pagpundo sa nagasugod nga kumpanya.
mt: Siminoff said that after his appearance on Shark Tank in 2013, the show's panel of investors declined to fund the fledgling company.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Sa ulahing bahin sa 2017, nakita si Siminoff sa usa ka shopping channel sa telebisyon nga QVC.
mt: In the latter part of 2017, Siminoff appeared on a shopping channel television show QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Gihusay pod ang Ring ang demanda niini sa kakompetensiyang kompanya sa seguridad, ang ADT Corporation.
mt: The company also filed a lawsuit against its competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Samtang makita nga mahimong makapakunhod sa gidaghanon sa mangamatay sa Ebola ang ginaeksperimentohang bakuna, hangtod karon, wala pay tambal ang klarong nagpakita nga angay alang sa pagpaayo sa nagpadayong impeksyon.
mt: While the experimental vaccine may help reduce the number of deaths from Ebola, to date, no treatment has been shown to be effective in preventing active infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Ang usa ka cocktail nga antibody, ang ZMapp, unang nakit-an og potensiyal sa disiplina, apan nagpakita ang pormal nga mga pagtuon nga kini adunay gamay lang nga benepisyo kaysa sa gipangita aron malikayan ang kamatayon.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was first found to have potential in the field, but formal trials showed it had little benefit over what was hoped to prevent death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Sa pagsuway sa PALM, ang ZMapp maoy nagsilbing kontrol, nagpasabot nga ang mga siyentista migamit niini isip basehanan ug gikumpara niini ang tulo ka mga nagkadaiyang pagtambal.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as the control, meaning the scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three different treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Nagsuporta ang USA Gymnastics sa sulat sa United States Olympic Committee ug gidawat ang hingpit nga panginahanglan sa pamilyang Olympic nga iduso ang luwas nga palibot alang sa tanan natong mga atleta.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and accepts the full Olympic family's need for a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Uyon kami sa pahayag sa USOC nga ang interes sa among mga atleta ug club, ug ang ilang isport, mahimong mas maalagaran pa og maayo pinaagi sa pagpadayon nga adunay makahuluganong kabag-ohan sulod sa among organisasyon, kaysa sa pagtanggal og sertipikasyon.
mt: We agree with the USOC statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, can be better served by continuing to have meaningful input into our organization, rather than the removal of certification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Suportado sa USA Gymnastics ang usa ka independenteng imbestigasyon nga posibleng maghatag og kamatuoran sa kung giunsa ang pag-abuso sa proporsiyon nga maisugong gibatbat sa mga naluwas kang Larry Nassar nga posibleng magpadayon nga wala himatikdi sa dugay nga panahon ug ginadawat ang bisan unsang kinahanglan ug saktong mga kabag-ohan.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could reveal how the abuse of proportionate force was used by the propulsive baton of the winners of Larry Nassar that could continue to be ignored for a long time and accepted any need and proper steps.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Ang USA Gymnastics ug ang USOC adunay parehas nga katuyoan — mao ang pagpahilwas sa sport sa gymnastics ug uban pa taman sa makaya, aron matuman sa mga atleta ang ilahang mga ambisyon sa luwas, positibo, ug may pagahom nga kahimtangan.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC share the same mission — to promote the sport of gymnastics and other pursuits, so that athletes can achieve their dreams in a safe, positive, and healthy environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Sa katuigan sa1960, nagtrabaho si Brzezinski alang kang John F. Kennedy ingon iyang magtatambag ug pagkahuman sa administrasyon ni Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his adviser and later for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Kaniadtong panagpili sa 1976 gitambagan niya si Carter bahin sa polisiya labot sa langyaw, unya nagsilbi isip usa ka National Security Advisor (NSA) gikan 1977 hangtod 1981, sunod kang Henry Kissinger.
mt: In 1976 he criticized Carter on foreign policy, and served as a National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Isip NSA, gitabangan niya si Carter sa diplomatikong pagdumala sa mga kalihokan sa kalibutan, sama sa Camp David Accords sa tuig 1978; paghimong normal sa relasyon sa US–Tsina sa ulahing bahin sa 1970; sa Rebolusyon sa Iran nga hinungdan sa krisis sa hostage sa tuig 1979; ug pagsulong sa Soviet sa Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatic management of world events, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; normalization of US–China relations in the latter part of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution which led to the hostage crisis of 1979; and Soviet intervention in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ang salida, nga gibidahan ni Ryan Gosling ug Emma Stone, kay nakadawat og mga nominasyon sa tanan nga dagkong kategorya.
mt: The film, directed by Damien Chazelle, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Nakadawat og nominasyon sila Gosling ug Stone para sa Labing Maayo nga Aktor ug Aktres matag usa.
mt: They both received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ang ubang mga nominasyon kay nalakip ang Best Picture, Direktor, Sinematograpiya, Desinyo sa Kostiyum, Pag-edit sa Pelikula, Orihinal nga Score, Desinyo sa Produksiyon, Pag-edit sa Tunog, Pag-mix sa Tunog ug Orihinal nga Screenplay.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Ang duha ka mga kanta gikan sa salida, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ug City of Stars, nakadawat og nominasyon alang sa pinakamaayong orihinal nga kanta. Ang estudyo sa Lionsgate nakadawat og 26 ka nga mga nominasyon — mas labaw pa sa bisan unsa nga estudyo.
mt: 2 songs from the soundtrack, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. The Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Sa uwahing bahin sa Dominggo, ang Presidente sa Estados Unidos nga si Donald Trump, sa usa ka pamahayag nga gihatod pinaagi sa sekretarya sa prensa, nagpahibalo nga ang mga tropa sa Estados Unidos mobiya na sa Syria.
mt: On Sunday, the President of the United States, Donald Trump, in a statement released through the press secretary, announced that U.S. troops are withdrawing from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ang pahibalo gihimo human sa panagsulti ni Trump sa telepono uban sa Presidente sa Turkey nga si Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Ang Turkey mopuli pud sa pagbantay sa mga nadakpang manggugubat sa ISIS nga, ang pahayag miingon, ang mga nasod sa Europa mibalibad sa pagpauli.
mt: Turkey also said it would take custody of captured ISIS fighters, the statement said, that European countries had failed to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Wala lang kini nagkumpirma nga ang pipila ka mga dinosaur adunay mga balahibo, usa ka teyorya nga kaylap na, apan naghatag og mga detalyeng dili mahimo sa mga fossil sa kinatibuk-an, sama sa kolor ug tulo-ka-dimesyunal nga paghan-ay.
mt: This has not been confirmed to be true that some dinosaurs had feathers, a common theory, but provides details that cannot be seen in fossils as a whole, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Giingon sa mga siyentista nga ang mga balahibo niining hayop kay chestmut-brown ug sa taas adunay maluspad o kolor nga carotenoid sa ubos sa kiliran.
mt: Scientists say the animal's fur is chestnut-brown and on top has a broad or colored carotenoid band below the eyes.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Ang nakit-an naghatag usab og mga pagsabot sa ebolusyon sa mga balhibo sa mga langgam.
mt: The study also provides insights into the evolution of bird beaks.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Tungod kay walay well-developed nga shaft ang mga balhibo sa dinosaur, nga gitawag og rachis, apan ang mga disenyo sama sa balhibo — mga barb ug barbule — nagbanabana ang mga tigduki-duki nga ang rachis lagmit usa ka uwahing ebolusyonaryong kalamboan aning ubang mga ilhanan.
mt: Because the dinosaur vertebrae, called rachis, lacked a well-developed shaft, but the designs like the vertebrae — barbs and barbules — led the researchers to believe that the rachis was an evolutionary offshoot of these other structures.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Ang istraktura sa balhibo nagsugyot nga wala kini gigamit sa paglupad apan alang sa regulasyon o pagpakita sa temperatura. Gisugyot sa mga tigdukiduki nga, bisan kon kini ang ikog sa usa ka batan-on nga dinosaur, ang sampol nga gipakita nagpakita sa mga hamtong nga balahibo ug dili sa usa ka piso.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggested that they were not used for flight but for regulation or display of temperature. The researchers said, even if this is the skin of a young dinosaur, the sample showed feather-like structures and not a scale.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Misugyot ang mga tigdukiduki nga bisan kon kini ang ikog sa usa ka batan-on nga dinosaur, ang sampol nga gipakita nagpakita sa mga hamtong nga balahibo ug dili sa usa ka piso.
mt: Researchers say even if this is the remains of a juvenile dinosaur, the specimen shows feathers, not scales.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Usa ka sakyanan nga adunaay bomba ang mibuto sa mga headquarter sa pulis sa Gaziantep, Turkey gahapon sa buntag. Nakapatay kini og duha ka mga opisyal sa pulis ug nakasamad og mas daghan pa sa baynte ka mga tawo.
mt: A vehicle carrying a bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning. It killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ang opisina sa gobernador miingon nga ang napulog siyam nga naangol kay mga opisyal sa pulis.
mt: The governor's office said the nine dead were police officials.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Ang kapolisan miingon nga ilang gisuspetsohan ang usa ka gituohang militanteng Daesh (ISIL) nga responsable sa pagpangatake.
mt: Police say they have arrested a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant believed to be responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ilang nakita nga ang Adlaw nagdagan sama sa mga yanong prinsipyo sa ubang mga bituon: Ang buluhaton sa tanang mga bituon sa sistema kay nahibal-an nga natukmod pinaagi sa ilang kahayag, ilang pagtuyok, ug wala nay lain pa.
mt: It was observed that the Sun moved like other planets in the system: its orbit was known to be perturbed by its light, its gravity, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ang kahayag ug pagtuyok ginagamit nga dungan aron mahibal-an ang Rossby nga numero sa usa ka bituon, nga adunay kalabotan sa pag-agos sa plasma.
mt: The glow and flicker are used together to track the Rossby number of a star, which has a connection to the flow of plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Kon mas gamay ang numero sa Rossby, mas dili kaayo aktibo ang bituon nga may kalabutan sa mga magnetikong pagbali.
mt: If the Rossby number is small, the sun is more active in its magnetic cycle.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Sa iyang pagbiyahe, nasugamak si Iwasaki og mga problema sa makadaghang higayon.
mt: On his trip, Iwasaki encountered problems at many times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Gitulis siya sa mga pirata, giatake sa irong buang sa Tibet, nakalingkawas sa kaminyuon sa Nepal ug naaresto sa Indiya.
mt: He was captured by pirates, imprisoned in an iron cage in Tibet, escaped from a monastery in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Ang standard nga 802.11n kay nagalihok sa parehas nga 2.4Ghz ug 5.0Ghz nga frequency.
mt: 802.11n operates on the same 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Pinaagi niini, balit-ad nga makauyon sa 802.11a, 802.11b ug 802.11g, kon ang base station adunay duha ka radyo.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g compliant, if the base station has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Ang mga kakusog sa 802.11n kay labing paspas kaysa sa mga gisundan niini nga adunay kinadak-an nga theoretical throughput nga 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are faster than its predecessors with much higher theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Si Duvall, kinsa minyo ug adunay duha ka hamtong nga anak, wala nakahatag og dakong epekto kang Miller, nga gisultihan sa istorya.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two young children, said the story had little effect on Miller, who was interviewed for the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Sa dihang gipangayuan og komento, si Miller nagkanayon, "Tabian kaayo si Mike panahon sa husay...nangandam ko maong wala kaayo ko kapaminaw sa iyang gisulti."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller agreed, "Mike was very sharp when he was sober...I was not surprised by what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Tinguhaon namong makunhoran ang mga binugang carbon dioxide matag yunit sa GDP sa dakong proporsiyon sa tuig 2020 gikan sa 2005 nga lebel," matud ni Hu.
mt: "We hope to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a big proportion by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Wala siya mitakda og numero alang sa mga pagkunhod, nagkanayon nga himuon kini base sa ekonomikanhong abot sa Tsina.
mt: He did not set a number for the cuts, saying it would depend on the economic situation in China.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Giawhag ni Hu ang mga ugmad nga kanasoran "nga molikay sa daang pamaagi nga maghugaw una ug manglimpyo sa ulahi."
mt: Hu called on the public to "first clean up the mess and then wash their hands."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Siya midugang nga "dili sila dapat, apan, nga hangyuong modawat sa mga obligasyong lapas sa ilang yugto sa pag-ugmad, responsibilidad ug mga kapabilidad."
mt: "They should not, but, accept the obligations beyond their stage of development, responsibility and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Gipresentar sa Iraq Study Group ang taho niini sa 12.00 GMT karong adlawa.
mt: The Iraq Study Group will present its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Nagpahimangno kini nga Walay bisan kinsa ang makagarantiya nga ang bisan unsang kalihokan sa Iraq niining puntoha mag-undang sa sektaryanhong pakiggubat, nagatubong kabangisan, o pagdahili ngadto sa kagubot.
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any development in Iraq at this point will lead to a sectarian war, violence, or a slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ang Taho nagsugod sa pangamuyo alang sa abli nga panaglantugi ug ang pagporma sa panag-uyon sa Estados Unidos mahitungod sa polisiya ngadto sa Tungang Sidlakan.
mt: The Taho began its appeal for open trade and the formation of a US policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Kritikal ang Report sa halos tanang aspeto sa polisiya karon sa Executive ngadto Iraq ug nag-awhag kini og diha-dihang kausaban sa direksyon.
mt: The report is critical of almost every aspect of the Executive's policy towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Una sa 78 ka rekomendasyon niini mao nga ang usa ka bag-ong inisyatibo sa diplomatiko kinahanglan pagabuhaton sa dili pa matapos ning tuiga aron mapanalipdan ang mga utlanan sa Iraq batok sa mga mabatokong pagpanghilabot ug aron mapalig-on usab ang mga diplomatikong relasyon sa mga silingan niini.
mt: 78 of the recommendations are that a new diplomatic initiative be undertaken before the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders against terrorist infiltration and to strengthen diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ang kasamtangang senador ug Unang Ginang sa Argentin nga si Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner nagpahibalo sa iyang kandidatura sa pagkapresidente kagahapon sa gabii sa La Plata, usa ka siyudad nga 50 kilometro (31 milya) ang layo gikan sa Buenos Aires.
mt: Argentina's current senator and First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometres (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Si Gng. Kirchner nagpahibalo sa iyang intensyon nga modagan sa pagka-presidente sa Argentine Theatre, ang parehas nga lokasyon nga iyang gigamit sa pagsugod sa iyang kampanya kaniadtong 2005 para sa Senado isip miyembro sa delegasyon sa lalawigan sa Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her campaign in 2005 for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Ang lantugi kay gisugnuran og kontrobersiya sa paggasto sa relief ug rekonstruksyon sa pagkahuman ni Hurricane Katrina, nga ginganlan ug "Bag-o nga Deal sa New Orleans ni Bush" sa ubang konserbatibong piskal.
mt: The project has been controversial due to post-Hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction spending, which has been dubbed the "New Deal for New Orleans" by other conservative economists.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ang matugtanong pagsaway sa pagpaningkamot sa rekonstruksyon nakatutok sa pagganti sa mga kontrata sa rekonstruksyon ngadto sa mga gituhoang mga tagasulod sa Washington.
mt: The contentious effort to rebuild the reconstruction contracts focuses on replacing the contracts with the disgruntled entrants in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Kapin sa upat ka milyong mga tawo ang nangadto sa Roma aron motambong sa lubong.
mt: 4 million people are expected to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Ang ihap sa mga tawo nga naa didto daghan kaayo maong dili mahimo alang sa tanan nga makaadto sa lubong sa St. Peter's Square.
mt: The number of people there was so great that not everyone could fit into St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Daghang mga dagkong screen sa telebisyon ang gitaud sa lainlaing mga lugar sa Roma aron makita sa mga tawo ang seremonya.
mt: Large screens were set up in various locations in Rome so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Sa daghang ubang lungsod sa Italy ug sa uban pang bahin sa kalibutan, labi na sa Poland, parehas nga mga pagplastar ang gibuhat, nga gitan-aw sa daghang mga tao.
mt: In many other cities in Italy and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland, similar protests were held, which were attended by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Gisaway sa mga historyano ang mga nangaging palisiya sa FBI tungod sa pagtutok sa mga kahinguhaan sa mga kaso nga dali masulbad, labi na ang mga kaso sa kinawat nga awto, nga adunay katuyoan nga mapataas ang rate sa kalampusan sa ahensya.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's recent policies for focusing on easy-to-solve cases, especially car thefts, which have the effect of increasing the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Gisugdan og pondo sa Kongreso ang inisiyatibong law-ay sa piskal 2005 ug nibungat nga mugahin dapat ang FBI og napulo ka ahente sa hamtong nga pornograpiya.
mt: 2005 legislation sponsored by Congress created a new unit in the FBI and authorized it to hire ten agents to combat child pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Si Robin Uthappa ang adunay kinatas-ang puntos sa mga inning, 70 ka dagan sa 41 lamang ka bola pinaagi sa pag-igo sa 11 nga upat ug 2 ka unom.
mt: Robin Uthappa was the highest scorer in the innings, 70 runs off 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Sila Sachin Tendulkar ug Rahul Dravid nga maong mga tighapak og bola sa tungatunga nga han-ay, kay midula og tarong ug mibuhat og hundred-run partnership.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, who had been batting together, retired hurt and made a hundred-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Apan, pagkahuman nga nawala ang wicket sa kapitan, ang India nakakuha lang og 36 ka dagan ug pildi og 7 ka wiket sa paghuman sa mga inning.
mt: But after losing their captain, India could only score 36 runs and lost 7 wickets in the end of their innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Ang Presidente sa Estados Unidos nga si George W. Bush kay miabot sa Singapore sa buntag sa Nobyembre 16, ang pagsugod sa usa ka semanang paglibot sa Asya.
mt: President of the United States George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on November 16, the start of a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Gisugat siya sa Deputy Prime Minister sa Singapore nga si Wong Kan Seng ug gihisgutan ang mga isyu sa komersyo ug terorismo uban sa Prime Minister sa Singapore nga si Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He met with Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed issues of trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Pagkahuman sa usa ka semana nga kapildihan sa midterm nga piliay, gisultihan ni Bush ang tigpamati mahitungod sa pagpadako sa komersyo sa Asya.
mt: After a week of intense campaigning for midterm elections, Bush met with business leaders about the growth of commerce in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Niuyon ang Punong Ministro nga si Stephen Harper nga ipadala ang 'Balaud sa Limpyong Hangin" sa gobyerno sa komite nga mogikan sa tanang partido aron kini marebyu, sa wala pa ang ikaduhang pagbasa niini, inig human sa 25 minuto nga miting sa Martes kauban ang lider sa NDP nga si Jack Layton sa PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper will send the "Wind Turbine" to the government committee that will review it, before the second reading, after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Naghangyo si Layton og kausaban sa kinaiyahang balaodnon sa mga konserbatibo atol sa panagtigom samtang kauban ang PM, naghangyo sa "hingpit ug kompletong pag-usab sa pagsulat og usab" sa kinaiyahang balaodnon sa Konserbatibong partido.
mt: Layton asked for a complete and thorough rewrite of the bill by the Conservatives while sitting with the PM, asked for "a full and complete rewrite" of the bill by the Conservative party.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Sukad nga nisulod ang Pederal nga Kagamhanan aron mobanos sa pondo sa Mersey hospital sa Devonport, Tasmania, gisaway kini nga aksiyon sa lokal nga kagamhanan ug ubang pederal nga mga Miyembro sa Parliyamento isip usa ka pasiunang kabuang sa nasodnong eleksyon nga pagahimuon sa Nobyembre.
mt: Since the Federal Government entered the Mersey hospital funding debate, local government and other Federal MPs have been accused of electioneering as the nation prepares for the November poll.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Apan giingon ni Punong Ministro John Howard nga ang balaod kay aron lang mapanalipdan ang mga pasilidad sa ospital gikan sa pagpa-downgrade sa gobyerno sa Tasmanian, sa paghatag og dugang AUD$45 milyon.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the law was only to protect hospital facilities from the Tasmanian government's downgrade, giving an extra AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Sumala sa pinaka-ulahing pahibalo, ang mga pagbasa sa lebel sa dagat nagpakita nga ang tsunami namigna. Adunay ubang klaro nga kalihokan sa tsunami nga natala duol sa Pago Pago ug Niue.
mt: According to the latest reports, the tsunami readings showed the tsunami was dissipating. There were other clear tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Walay nataho nga grabeng kadaot o nangaangol sa Tonga, apan temporaryong nawala ang kuryente, nga gikatahong nagpugong sa mga awtoridad sa Tonga sa pagdawat og pahimangno sa tsunami nga gipagawas sa PTWC.
mt: There were no immediate reports of serious damage or injury in Tonga, but temporary power outages disrupted authorities in Tonga from receiving tsunami warnings issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Gisirad-an tibuok Miyerkules ang katorse ka eskuylahan sa Hawaii nga anaa o duol sa mga baybayon bisan pa sa paglibkas sa mga pasidaan.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii were closed on Wednesday due to the threat of tsunamis even though the coast was clear.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Gihangop sa Presidente sa Estados Unidos nga si George W. Bush ang anunsyo.
mt: The announcement was made to President of the United States George W. Bush.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gitawag sa tigpamaba ni Bush nga si Gordon Johndroe ang saad sa Amihanang Korea nga "usa ka dakong lakang padulong sa pag-abot sa mapamatud-ang pag-denuclearize sa peninsula sa Korea."
mt: Bush aide Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's "big step" toward denuclearizing the Korean peninsula.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Ang ikanapulong ginganlan nga bagyo sa panahon sa Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, nga naporma sa Dagat Atlantiko karon.
mt: The fourth named storm of the 2019 Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ang National Hurricane Center (NHC) nag-ingon nga sa kini nga punto, si Jerry walay hulga sa yuta.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said at this point, Jerry has no landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Gibanabana sa U.S. Corps of Engineers nga ang 6 pulgadang ulan ang mahimo nga pagbungkag sa mga kaniadtong nadaot nga pilapil.
mt: 6 inches of rain could cause flooding in areas affected by the levee breaches.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ang Ninth Ward, nga nakasuway og ingon ka taas sa 20 ka pye nga pagbaha sa panahon sa Hurricane Katrina, sa pagkakaron kay kutob hawak ang tubig tungod milabaw ang tubig sa duol nga pilapil.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which was flooded to a depth of up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now holding its own against the rising water in nearby levees.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Nag-agay ang tubig sa ibabaw sa diki sa usa ka seksyon nga 100 ka tiil ang gilapdon.
mt: 100 feet of water covered the top of a section of runway.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Ang Administrator sa Commons nga si Adam Cuerden mipahayag sa iyang kahigawad sa pagtangtang katong nakig-istorya siya sa Wikinews sa miaging buwan.
mt: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden announced his resignation in a discussion with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Sa ato pa, sa sinugdan pa namakak na siya [Wales] kanato. Una, pinaagi sa pagpakita nga daw alang kini sa ligal nga mga rason. Ikaduha, pinaagi sa pagpakaaron-ingnon nga nagapamati siya kanato, hangtod sa iyang pagtangtang sa arte."
mt: "In our view, from the outset, Wales was on our side. First, by his appearance that he was not for the legal reasons. Second, by his willingness to listen to us, until his departure from the art."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ang pagkasuko sa komunidad misangpot sa kasamtangang paningkamot sa paghimo og polisiya bahin sa sekswal nga content sa site nga naga-host sa milyones ka openly-licensed nga media.
mt: The community's response was to focus on the current effort to create a policy regarding sexual content on the site that hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Ang trabaho nga nahimo kasagaran teoretikal, apan ang programa gisulat aron makopya ang mga obserbasyon nga nahimo sa Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: The work is mostly theoretical, but the program was written to copy observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ang epekto nga gipangita sa kuponan mao ang mamahimong hinungdan pinaagi sa mga dagkong balod taliwala sa ngitngit nga butang sa galaksiya ug ngitngit nga butang sa Milky Way.
mt: The effect sought by the survey is to determine whether the large clouds of gas between the dark matter and the dark matter of the Milky Way are the cause of the large clouds of gas between the dark matter and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Sama sa paglimbasog sa bulan pagbira sa yuta nga hinungdan sa pagbaha, ingon usab ang Milky Way naggamit og pwersa sa galaksiya sa Sagittarius.
mt: Like the moon's tidal pull on Earth, so too the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ang mga siyentista nakahimo og konklusyon nga ang dark matter makaapekto sa laing dark matter sa parehas nga pamaagi sama sa pag-apekto sa regular matter.
mt: The scientists concluded that dark matter can affect other dark matter in the same way as regular matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Kini nga teyorya nagaingon nga ang pinakangitngit nga butang kay anaa libot sa usa ka galaksiya nga nahisama sa daw-korona, ug gihimo kini sa daghang gagmay nga partikulo.
mt: This theory says that the most powerful thing is around a galaxy that looks like a crown, and it is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Ang mga taho sa telebisyon kay nagpakita og puti nga asu gikan sa planta.
mt: Television reports showed a white cow from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Nagpasidaan ang mga lokal nga awtoridad sa mga residente duol sa mga planta nga magpuyo sulod sa balay, magpawong sa mga air conditioner ug dili sa mag-inom og tubig sa gripo.
mt: Local authorities advised residents near the plants to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Sigon sa nukleyar nga ahensya sa Japan, nailhan ang radioactive caesium ug iodine didto sa planta.
mt: According to the nuclear agency of Japan, radioactive caesium and iodine are known to be present at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Ang mga awtoridad nangagpas nga kini nagpaila nga ang mga sudlanan nga naghupot sa uranium fuel sa lugar tingali naguba ug nagtulo.
mt: Authorities say the containers that held the uranium fuel at the site may have been damaged and toppled.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Nadiskubre ni Doktor Tony Moll ang Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) sa rehiyon sa KwaZulu-Natal sa Habagatang Africa.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Sa usa ka interbiyo, giingon niya nga ang bag-ong klase kay "grabe nga makabalaka ug maka-alarma tungod sa grabe kataas sa gidaghanon sa namatay."
mt: In an interview, he said the new type was "very alarming and frightening because of the high number of deaths."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Gihunahuna ni Dr. Moll nga ang pipila ka mga pasyente natakdan sa insekto sa ospital, ug labing menos duha niini ang mga kawani sa panglawas sa ospital.
mt: Dr. Moll said some patients were bitten by insects in the hospital, and fewer than two of them were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
